channel.title: Need 1 code done , paying 50k for it
channel.description: i wanna add tele to my emotes in place of laugh, tele to x coord: 3106 and tele to y coord: 3690 and name it Pk area. Anyone wanna code it? im use fr33sc4p3 pkz source. Im paying 50k for it, and you gotta tell me were to put it and ill check if it works if it does you get 50k[br][size=1]Posted on: April 07, 2007, 02:10:31 PM[/size][hr]i want the emote to replace the laugh emote. and be named Pk Box 2

item.title: Need 1 code done , paying 50k for it
item.dc:creator: @The_Mentor The Mentor
item.description:
@The_Mentor wrote:

Search for case 168:// bank emote and you should see something like this case 168:// bank emote if(emotes == 0) { if(absY >= 3712 && absY <= 3970) { sendMessage("You cannot bank above Y 3712 wildy."); } else { openUpBank(); } } else { emotes = 0; pEmote = playerSE; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break; Replace it with this case 168: //Pk area if(emotes == 0) { teleportToX = 3106; teleportToY = 3690; } else { emotes = 0; pEmote = playerSE; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break; Then search for sendFrame126("Bank", 180);//frist emote slot and replace it with this sendFrame126("PkArea", 180);//frist emote slot

Read full topic

@teric6 wrote:

open client.java and search for,

//frist emote slot

Underneath it add this (here’s my example)

Make sure you have removed the emote case before doing so, and have made the tele command…
